column4: is there anybody who can help me find out what it is that I need to install to get vmware running on my pc?
Have you downloaded the VMWare package?  IIRC, that's all I ever needed.  That and the stupid serial key.

I downloaded the package, installed it and used the serial key, but whenever I try and run it I get "vmware is installed, but it has not been (correctly) configured for this system. To (re-)configure it, invoke the following command: /usr/bin/vmware-config.pl." And then I run it and it happens again.
Have you rebooted?  There are some modules that need to be loaded that may not have fully loaded if you haven't done a reboot.
